mandatoryCapture.explanation: If capturing an opponent's piece is possible, the stone is forced to do so.

canCaptureBackwards.explanation: If capturing an opponent's piece is possible when jumping backwards, allow it. (A king can jump backwards even if this rule is set to false.)

flyingKing.explanation: The king can move any distance. (e.g. The king can capture an opposing piece any distance away by jumping to any of the unoccupied squares immediately beyond it.)
